description:
This course will teach you to create your own professional-quality comics and make money selling them.

I've been writing and selling my own professional-quality comic books for years and I can tell you the best way to do things so you spend as little money as possible to create exceptional works of sequential storytelling that anyone can buy and enjoy. I will provide you with the valuable resources you need to help you write entertaining comic book scripts and make them into viable products.

This course, comprised of over 14 lectures and two quizzes, will help everyone who ever wanted to make his or her own comics but couldn't draw well enough to produce professional books that can be sold to anyone who loves great art and stories. All you need is a desire to make comics and a willingness follow my instruction and do the coursework.

Learn:

  • Where to find artists, letterers and inkers
  • How to put your comic up for sale to millions of readers
  • How to write a great comic book script
  • How to promote your comics

Get:

  • Help promoting your book
  • A special discounted rate on a talented, dependable letterer
  • Advice from pros, including Chuck Dixon, Jimmy Palmiotti, Justin Gray, Stefan Petrucha, John Ostrander, Leah Moore & John Reppion, John Rozum, Dean Motter, John Arcudi, Sean McKeever, Peter Bagge, David Hine, Dan Jolly, JM DeMatteis, Tom Peyer, Dan Jurgens, Stuart Moore and Chris Ryall

I'm confident you'll be happy with this course. You can get a full refund if you are unsatisfied with it for any reason.

Join us and start making your own professional quality comic books!
title: Write and Publish Comic Books for Fun and Profit
